item.description:
Summer is over ladies and I know that it's sad to think about, but it's time to get back to business!  What better way to get back into the swing of things than a great networking event?

Join us on Wednesday, September 12, 2012 for our September Networking Event.  Here's what to expect:

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

3 Simple Strategies to Give Your Business A New Financial Start

While you may not be able to wave a magic want and make your debt disappear or suddenly have faith that your business will grow, you can create a plan to put you back in control of your financial future.

Come and learn the three best strategies to make that happen!

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
